context.p:
It is possible to search for a specific test case by either:
Typing into the search box and clicking "Search"
Utilizing the Drop Down options given for Product, Feature and Component
There is also an advanced Search option which can be accessed by clicking on the "More" search button

ul.li: Login to the TMS system using your corporate user Id
From the Quick Links section select “Select a Test Case”

step.cmd: Either Search by typing text into the search bar OR search by Drop down options for Product, Feature and Components

info.p: If you opt to search by text either hit enter or click search to apply the filter

result.p: The test cases matching the search criteria will be shown in a table
